author: John Bacho
message:
Refactor Complete

1. removed US_Sound_Delay, CS_plus_Object_Interval and CS_minus_Object_Interval.
2. Replaced US_Sound_Delay with a private const float named TimeUntilUnconditionedStimulusSound
3. Replaced CS_plus_Object_Interval and CS_minus_Object_Interval with a private const float named DisplayDuration
4. Removed US_Sound_Delay, CS_plus_Object_Interval and CS_minus_Object_Interval parameter from StartCS(), PlaySoundAfterDelay(), DisableObjects(), and JumpScare()
5. Renamed ABATesting to ABAContextSwitch
6. Fixed a bug that caused the stage to not properly update
7. added named arguments for all calls to StartCS() and InterTrial to improve readability
8. tweaked some comments to better reflect what the variable does
9. converted all variables in ExperimentScript to Title Case for uniformity

author: JohnBacho
message:
further refined

1. Changed the name of AssignOpener/Closer function to TriggerEntryOpen/Close to better reflect what it does.
2. Added comments to private variables.
3. removed result as private var and made it a local var
4. Changed the parameter playsound to ActivateUS to better reflect what it does.

author: JohnBacho
message:
Simplified ContextSwich

1. added a public drop down list to select AAA, BBB, ABA, BAB context switch
2. Dynamically changes to either Door script or elevator script based on which context it is in.
3. ABAContextSwitch bool has been removed and replaced with ActiveContext in function calls

author: JohnBacho
message:
Optimized Code

1. moved  sxr.SetStage("InterTrial"); inside of a HasExecuted if statment so that it only runs once
2. fixed a bug that made some contexts not appear properly.
3. split HabituationPhase, Fear AcquisitionPhase, FearExtinctionPhase, and InstructionPhase into separate functions to make it easier to manage
4. swapped out all the sxr.GetPhase(), sxr.GetTrial(),  and GetStepInTrial() calls in the switch statements and replaced them with
int phase = sxr.GetPhase(); int trial = sxr.GetTrial(); int step = sxr.GetStepInTrial(); at the top of the update function.

author: bertslb
message:
Updated concatenate.py

#13 Removed parentheses remover, updated reduce file creation to be based on stage name, got rid of main file reading, commented out camera tracker

author: John Bacho
message:
Optimized Codebase

1. Converted logic the relied on sxr.CheckTimer() to use Coroutine instead.
2. Removed majority of logic from Update() function to eliminate redundantly calling the same function 60+ per second improving performance.
3. created a new function called RunTrial which handles the CS and the InterTrial all within one function
4. removed the big and complex switch statemenst which handled the flow of the experiment and heavily relied on Update() to now just using RunTrial() to represent each trail.
5. Improved readability
6. went from an abysmal 1217 lines to now 449 lines

message:
Refactor US activation logic in coroutines

1. Removed ActivateUS parameter from PlaySoundAfterDelay and JumpScare coroutines, moving US activation checks to the calling method.
2. Simplified coroutine logic by always executing US actions when called, improving code clarity and reducing redundant checks.

author: JohnBacho
message:
Refactor US sound handling

1. Replaced individual US sound GameObjects with an AudioSource array for more flexible sound management.
2. Merged and simplified the logic for playing US sounds and triggering the US object into a single coroutine.
3. Updated scene references to match the new AudioSource array approach.

#34 #33 #22
1. Refactored V4ExperimentScript1 to remove anticipation input and related logic, simplifying trial execution.
2. Updated coroutine structure for stimulus and US presentation, and adjusted method signatures and calls accordingly.
3. Scene changes reflect updated object states and parameters to match the new script logic.

Add VIBES LAB logos and update UI handling

1. Added VIBES_LAB logo images and updated project settings to use them for splash screens and icons.
2. Improved UI_Handler and ExperimenterDisplayHandler scripts for better code style, input handling, and image display logic.
3. Adjusted V4 Main scene to remove unused components and update UI element properties.
4. Minor fix in V4ExperimentScript1 to ensure coroutine yields after displaying the trigger image.

author: John Bacho
message:
Refactor PatternLight to add pulsing color effect

Updated the PatternLight coroutine to smoothly pulse the light's intensity and emission color over a set duration, replacing the previous stepwise color and intensity changes. This provides a more dynamic lighting effect.

Add abort run feature and update warning image

Introduced AbortRun script to allow users to abort the experiment by holding a trigger for 5 seconds, displaying a warning image after 2.5 seconds. Updated the main scene to include this script, removed several unused GUI images and added a new WarningMessage.png.

author: pnlt
message:
fix(RadialSelectionMenu): Random selection when spamming button

Fixed Button Spam Issue:

Added a "deadzone" parameter that prevents selections until the hand moves a minimum distance
Tracked initial hand position when menu opens
Created a proper state management system (menuActive flag)
Added clear selection logic when hand movement is below the threshold

Menu Positioning Improvements:

Added configurable distance parameter (menuDistanceFromHand)
Added customizable position offset vector
Implemented proper positioning logic that places the menu at a comfortable distance

author: tterpi
message:
Major refactor.

Control point class introduced that holds parameters and tangent calculation logic. Spline class now uses list of control points.
Currently only the complete spline can be calculated. Logic for manipulating and adding single control points without recalculating the entire spline is todo.
files_changed: InterpolatedLine.cs; KochanekBartelsControlPoint.cs; KochanekBartelsControlPoint.cs.meta; KochanekBartelsInterpolation.cs; KochanekBartelsSpline.cs; KochanekBartelsSpline.cs.meta; manifest.json; EditorSettings.asset; ProjectVersion.txt

author: tterpi
message:
Refactoring line extrusion.

New LineExtruder class was created that is used in ExtrusionTest. The
new class now holds all meshing code.

author: tterpi
message:
Changed the interpolation to remove duplicate points.

The duplicate points were causing issues with the mesh generation. The
problem now is that the last control point of the spline is not being
reached. The line ends one interpolation step before the last
control point.

author: tterpi
message:
Last segment of spline now reaches last control point.

Calculation of the last segment was changed to reach the position of the
last control point. Before it would end one interpolated point before because
the first point of the next segment would be at the position and the
last segment was not treated differently.
Also refactored the method getControlPointsForSegment.

author: tterpi
message:
Removed MeshFilterReference from SplineMesh script.

Now the methods return Mesh objects that are assigned to the MeshFilter
in the LineSketchObjectScript.

author: tterpi
message:
SplineMesh can now be instantiated with a ITubeMesh object.

Refactored SplineMesh to no longer hold copies of the mesh cross
section. Only TubeMeshes hold this data now. Added a CrossSection class
containing vertices, normals and scale of a cross section. ITubeMesh now
requieres methods for getting and setting cross sections and TubeMesh
and ParallelTransportTubeMesh implement this. LineSketchObject still
uses the default contructor of SplineMesh which uses TubeMesh.

author: tterpi
message:
Refactored the deserialization of a sketch to make it...

easier to extend. The data class for each type of ISerializableComponent
now knows the prefab to instantiate when it is deserialized. This means
that the SketchObjectGroup class no longer has to be changed when a new
type of SketchObject is implemented. Only a data class has to be
created.

author: John Bacho
message:
Add BetManager and UI for betting system

Introduces BetManager.cs to handle wallet, bet increments, odds selection, payout calculation, and bet submission logic. Adds new UI elements for wallet, bet, toggled odds, and payout display. Removes obsolete scripts and updates scene objects to integrate the new betting system, including button interactions and layout changes.
files_changed: BetManager.cs; BetManager.cs.meta; accentcolor 1.mat; accentcolor 1.mat.meta; accentcolor.mat; accentcolor.mat.meta; V4 Main.unity; DoorController.cs; ElevatorDoorController.cs; ElevatorDoorController.cs.meta; LightingHandler.cs; ScriptHandler.cs; SimpleCharacterMover.cs; SimpleCharacterMover.cs.meta; SinglePressInteractable.cs; SinglePressInteractable.cs.meta; TalkingAmbience.cs; TalkingAmbience.cs.meta; TogglePressInteractable.cs; TogglePressInteractable.cs.meta; V4ExperimentScript1.cs; V4ExperimentScript1.cs.meta; VRControllerHandler.cs; VRControllerHandler.cs.meta; VRDynamicResolution.cs; VRDynamicResolution.cs.meta; sXR_prefab.prefab

author: John Bacho
message:
Refactor parlay bet submission and add UI feedback

Reworked BetManager to use decimal odds for parlay payout calculation and replaced percentage-based win logic with probability derived from decimal odds. Added Win, Loss, and Error message UI elements for user feedback, and implemented coroutine-based submission with temporary UI messages. Updated scene to include new UI elements and adjusted button event bindings and transforms for improved user interaction.

author: John Bacho
message:
Add leaderboard feature and UI updates

Introduces a Leaderboard class to display player standings and updates BetManager to interact with it. Adds a new LeaderBoard UI element to the main scene, updates object names for clarity, and adds a Black material asset. Removes unused sphere objects and makes minor UI layout adjustments.
files_changed: BetManager.cs; Black.mat; Black.mat.meta; Leaderboard.cs; Leaderboard.cs.meta; V4 Main.unity

author: John Bacho
message:
Add card removal functionality and prefab integration

Introduces RemoveCard script and integrates it with CardManager for proper card removal. Updates scene and prefabs to support card removal via UI, refactors card spawning logic, and improves slider reset behavior in BetManager.
files_changed: BetManager.cs; CardManager.cs; RemoveCards.cs; RemoveCards.cs.meta; V2.unity; ParlaySpawn.prefab; ParlaySpawn.prefab.meta; TogglePressInteractable.cs; ToggleButton.cs

author: John Bacho
message:
Improve UI flow and card management for parlay bets

Refactored BetManager to use a MiddleUI GameObject for UI visibility and improved error messaging. Added CardManager reference and implemented RemoveAllCards to clear cards and reset toggles after bet resolution. Updated TogglePressInteractable with a ResetToggle method for better state management. Adjusted scene hierarchy, UI layout, and odds/team data in V2.unity for consistency and clarity.

author: John Bacho
message:
Add cash-out feature and near-miss handling

Introduces a cash-out UI and logic for parlay bets, allowing users to cash out early on near-miss scenarios. Refactors BetManager to support dynamic toggles, updates CardManager for card color animations, and enhances Leaderboard with more players and improved display. Scene updated to include new UI elements for cash-out functionality.

author: John Bacho
message:
Add cash out payout display and improve card layout

Introduces a CashOutPayoutText field to BetManager and updates the UI to show the cash out payout when available. CardManager now configures its grid layout dynamically based on the number of cards, improving card arrangement and responsiveness. Scene updated to include the new payout text and remove redundant layout components.

author: John Bacho
message:
Improve bucket text fade and handle reset logic

Refactored Bucket.cs to prevent overlapping text fade coroutines and adjusted fade duration. Added ResetHandle method to Handle.cs and updated GameManager to call it, ensuring the handle resets after each spin. Updated V2.unity scene with new colliders, adjusted object positions, font sizes, and spawn interval for improved gameplay and UI layout.
files_changed: Bucket.cs; GameManager.cs; V2.unity; Handle.cs; Electronic Highway Sign SDF.asset; ProjectSettings.asset

author: John Bacho
message:
BART has been fully implemented

Deleted multiple audio assets, metadata, and CSV data files from the project. Added new audio files and updated corresponding metadata. Renamed VRBikePump.cs to BART.cs and updated related meta files. Updated balloon material and scene files to reflect asset changes.

author: John Bacho
message:
Refactor slot machine logic and UI handling

Moved slot outcome and trial logic from GameManager to SlotHandler, centralizing spin, outcome resolution, and UI updates. Updated Driver and Handle to interact with SlotHandler instead of GameManager. Cleaned up GameManager, removed unused fields and methods, and improved scene wiring for new SlotHandler responsibilities. Enhanced UI elements in the scene for win/loss/wallet display and adjusted text alignment and margins.

author: John Bacho
message:
Refactor parlay logic and add NFLParlay1 prefab

Refactored BetManager to simplify parlay submission and outcome resolution, removing near-miss and cashout logic. Updated CardManager to use GetSelectedOdds instead of ListOfOdds with trial index. Added new NFLParlay1 prefab and its meta file.

author: John Bacho
message:
Refactor bet and card UI, update scene and prefabs

Refactored BetManager to improve UI updates and button interactivity, including new fields for wager and payout text, and added methods for toggling between betslip and parlay views. Updated CardManager to simplify card spawning and removed team2 references. Modified the V2.unity scene to update UI elements, prefabs, and layout, and added new UI GameObjects for wager display and navigation.

author: John Bacho
message:
Refactor parlay trial logic and update scene prefabs

Refactored BetManager and Driver to support parlay trials with dynamic leg counts and improved trial completion tracking. Updated V2.unity to replace NFLParlay3 prefab with NFLParlay3 and NFLParlay4 prefabs, and removed unused slider logic from BetManager. This improves parlay trial management and scene organization.

author: John Bacho
message:
Refactor trial logic and update timer to 45 seconds

Made UpdateOddsText public in BetManager. Adjusted CountdownTimer start time from 60 to 45 seconds and updated all related scene and script references. Refactored Driver to pass a boolean to RunEffortTaskTrial, allowing slot and parlay trials to be handled distinctly, and commented out unused slot outcome rows. Updated V2.unity scene with new team names, odds, object positions, and enabled several components. Modified font asset glyph indices and metrics for Electronic Highway Sign SDF.
files_changed: BetManager.cs; CountdownTimer.cs; Driver.cs; V2.unity; Electronic Highway Sign SDF.asset; ToggleButton.cs

author: John Bacho
message:
Integrate SXR data tracking and cleanup calibration

Added calls to sxr for tracking bet amounts, payouts, wallet, gambling type, and outcomes across BetManager, GameManager, SlotHandler, and Driver. Introduced data tracker initialization and gambling type management in Driver. Removed BrightnessCalibration script and its meta file, as well as an unused meta file. Updated font asset to add new glyphs.
files_changed: BetManager.cs; BrightnessCalibration.cs; BrightnessCalibration.cs.meta; Driver.cs; VR-LAB.meta; GameManager.cs; SlotHandler.cs; Electronic Highway Sign SDF.asset; ExperimentHandler.cs; sxr.cs

author: John Bacho
message:
Track toggle state in bet calculation logic

Updated BetManager to associate toggles with their odds using a dictionary, ensuring correct add/remove behavior for bets. Modified TogglePressInteractable and CardManager to pass toggle references when adding or removing odds, preventing duplicate or incorrect odds handling. Also reset toggle state and team index appropriately.

author: John Bacho
message:
Refactor trial completion and round reset logic

Moved MarkTrialComplete calls to ensure proper trial state management in BetManager and SlotHandler. Made ResetRound public in BetManager and added a rest method to SlotHandler for UI and state reset. Updated Driver to use new reset methods. Minor cleanup in TogglePressInteractable and added a trailing comma in ExperimentHandler log output.

author: John Bacho
message:
Improve slot and bet UI feedback and logic

Refactored bet and slot handlers to use private fields for current bets, improved UI feedback for placing bets, and adjusted win/loss message timings for a smoother user experience. Also added a coroutine to prompt users to place a bet and fixed handle reset logic in SlotHandler.
files_changed: BetManager.cs; Driver.cs; SlotHandler.cs; Electronic Highway Sign SDF.asset; LiberationSans SDF - Fallback.asset

author: John Bacho
message:
Move NextTrial call to end of RunEffortTaskTrial

The call to sxr.NextTrial() was moved from the start to the end of the RunEffortTaskTrial coroutine. This ensures the trial advances only after the effort task and cleanup are complete.

author: John Bacho
message:
Refactor slot game flow and UI updates

Removed unnecessary UI update calls from GameManager and adjusted coroutine flow in SlotHandler to ensure MarkTrialComplete is called after outcome resolution. Also removed a delay in Driver and disabled a MonoBehaviour in the V2 scene. Cleaned up unused font glyphs in the Electronic Highway Sign SDF asset.
files_changed: Driver.cs; GameManager.cs; V2.unity; SlotHandler.cs; Electronic Highway Sign SDF.asset

author: John Bacho
message:
Add audio cue and expand parlay trials

Added 'chiming-out.mp3' and integrated an AudioSource to play a sound when trial time is up. Increased the number of parlay trials from 15 to 16 and updated scene data accordingly. Refactored Driver.cs to support separate slot and parlay trial logic, improved outcome handling, and fixed odds selection in TogglePressInteractable. Corrected team name typo in scene data.

author: John Bacho
message:
Refactor button interactions for XR Toolkit

Replaced legacy Unity UI button and pointer event handling with XR Interaction Toolkit components and logic. Updated prefabs and scene to remove unused UI Button components, add XR interaction components, and connect toggles and button logic to XR events for VR compatibility.

author: John Bacho
message:
Integrate poke interaction and update UI prefabs

Replaced BetSlipButton with PokeButton in BetManager and updated its enable/disable logic. Added poke interaction components and colliders to NFLParlay1 prefab for ButtonOdds1 and ButtonOdds2. Updated prefab and scene to adjust transforms, add toggles, and remove the CashOutYes button, streamlining the UI for new interaction patterns.

author: John Bacho
message:
Refactor UI to use PokeButton and update layouts

Replaced standard Button components with PokeButton in BetManager and updated scene references accordingly. Improved CardManager grid layout logic for better scaling with card count. Refactored PokeButton initialization and added null safety. Updated V2.unity and prefabs to remove legacy Button components, adjust UI element positions, and connect new references. Cleaned up unused or redundant components in Parlay prefabs.
files_changed: BetManager.cs; CardManager.cs; Driver.cs; PokeButton.cs; V2.unity; Parlay1.prefab; ParlaySpawn.prefab; sXR_prefab.prefab

author: John Bacho
message:
Improve card layout handling and UI adjustments

Enhanced CardManager to robustly initialize and configure GridLayoutGroup, ensuring proper handling of active/inactive transitions and null references. Updated BetManager win text formatting for clarity. Adjusted scene and prefab UI element positions, scales, and font sizes for improved visual alignment. Removed unused poke filter components from NFLParlay1 prefab.

author: John Bacho
message:
Refactor wallet management and remove GameManager

Removed GameManager and WalletManager, introducing a ManageWallet interface implemented by BetManager and SlotHandler. Updated Bucket and Driver to use the new wallet management system, and refactored scene and prefab references accordingly. Also made minor UI and interaction adjustments, such as cooldown times and pressed scale values.
files_changed: GameManager.cs; NFLParlay1.prefab; V2.unity; BART.cs; BART.cs.meta; Ball.cs; Ball.cs.meta; BallSpawner.cs; BallSpawner.cs.meta; BetCardManager.cs; BetCardManager.cs.meta; BetManager.cs; BetManager.cs.meta; Bucket.cs; Bucket.cs.meta; ButtonPressScale.cs; ButtonPressScale.cs.meta; CardManager.cs; CardManager.cs.meta; CountdownTimer.cs; CountdownTimer.cs.meta; CustomPokeFilter.cs; CustomPokeFilter.cs.meta; Driver.cs; Driver.cs.meta; HapticFeedback.cs; HapticFeedback.cs.meta; Leaderboard.cs; Leaderboard.cs.meta; ManageWallet.cs; ManageWallet.cs.meta; NFL_NBA_UI_Toggle.cs; NFL_NBA_UI_Toggle.cs.meta; PokeButton.cs; PokeButton.cs.meta; RemoveCards.cs; RemoveCards.cs.meta; SlotHandler.cs; SlotHandler.cs.meta; ToggleButton.cs; ToggleButton.cs.meta; UIManager.cs; UIManager.cs.meta; VRButtonPress.cs; VRButtonPress.cs.meta; controllerTest.cs; controllerTest.cs.meta; WalletManager.cs; WalletManager.cs.meta

author: John Bacho
message:
Add pupil size averaging and refactor trial durations

Introduces pupil size averaging per trial in GazeHandler and updates the gaze data output to include combined and average pupil size. Refactors Driver to use serialized fields for trial durations and indices, and ensures pupil data is recorded at the end of each trial. Also improves color management in BetManager by using static color fields.

author: John Bacho
message:
Refactor trial data handling and outcome logic

Replaces hardcoded outcome arrays with serializable SlotTrialData and ParlayTrialData arrays, updating scene and script to use these for trial management. Simplifies trial progression by unifying slot and parlay trial logic into StartNextTrial, and updates enum naming for consistency. Removes redundant methods and data, improving maintainability and flexibility for trial configuration.

author: John Bacho
message:
Refactor CardManager and Driver for clarity and cleanup

Removed unused card animation methods from CardManager and cleaned up comments for better readability. In Driver, changed several public fields to private with [SerializeField] and made trial duration and index fields const for improved encapsulation and code safety.
Will continue to look for places to include SerializeField

author: John Bacho
message:
Refactor Driver and related scripts for serialization

Refactored the Driver class and related fields to use [SerializeField] and [System.Serializable] attributes for better Unity inspector integration. Replaced the SlotFirst boolean with a GamblingTypeFirst enum for improved clarity. Updated references in the scene and related scripts to match these changes, and made minor code cleanups in BouncingArrow and SlotHandler.

author: John Bacho
message:
Refactor constants and cleanup in game scripts

Moved magic numbers to named constants for timing and bet values in BetManager, SlotHandler, and Driver. Cleaned up serialized fields and variable declarations in Driver. Improved code readability and maintainability in Bucket and CardManager. Updated font asset to include additional glyphs.
files_changed: V2.unity; BetManager.cs; Bucket.cs; CardManager.cs; Driver.cs; Leaderboard.cs; SlotHandler.cs; Electronic Highway Sign SDF.asset

author: John Bacho
message:
Add end program and play-off music features

Introduced EndProgram and PlayOffMusic scripts to handle program completion and play-off music logic. Updated Driver to use these new scripts, refactored off-music handling, and modified the scene to include new GameObjects and references. Also adjusted gambling type logic and removed obsolete GazePlot object.
files_changed: EndProgram.cs; EndProgram.cs.meta; V2.unity; Driver.cs; PlayOffMusic.cs; PlayOffMusic.cs.meta

author: John Bacho
message:
Moved SetTotalOdds and add RestartTimer

SetTotalOdds moved from StartNextTrial to SwitchGamblingtype since it only needs to be rest when changing context not every trial. RestartTimer fixes an issue that caused the TrialTimer to continue counting even though the trial had ended.

author: John Bacho
message:
refactored betmanager and fixed #13

Renamed betmanager to be ParlayHandler and refactored code  to accept this new name. removed unused components from button 1 and 2 for nfl parlay prefab. Added in logic to prevent accidental button presses at start. Added in logic to prevent accidental button presses when going from parlay -> betslip UI when a bet was place beforehand. Removed mesh collider from arrow icon as it was causing an error and was not needed.
files_changed: NFLParlay1.prefab; V2.unity; CardManager.cs; Driver.cs; ParlayHandler.cs; ParlayHandler.cs.meta; SlotHandler.cs; ToggleButton.cs; TogglePressInteractable.cs; Arrow_Icon_02.prefab

author: John Bacho
message:
matched loss text between parlay and slot

Moved and matched loss text to that in the slot context. Also ran final checks on new code.

author: John Bacho
message:
Minor clean up

We use the website now to quickly process data the csv data and no longer need the python scripts.

author: John Bacho
message:
Parlay Tutorial updated

The tutorial for the parlay condition has been updated to include stats as well as being less overwhelming. Created a DetectMovement script that detects if the tablet in the parlay condition has move and if so it hides the grab handle tutorial as well as disables the script since it is no longer needed after that point. added logic to parlaytutorial to handle stat parlay as well as added logic to parlayhandler to make the order of steps more natural.

author: John Bacho
message:
Fixed #29

#29 this push should fix this error as well as remove redundant logic. It also the button logic being handled by parlayhandler into togglepressinteractables

author: John Bacho
message:
Converted Parlay Condition to Soundmanager

All audio code in parlayhandler has been converted to use soundmanager. Added a new function to soundmanager called playloop which loops the audio untill StopSound3D() is called. This commit should have solved issue #1. #2 Loss audio added to parlay condition (might change the audio clip to a different one). Removed magic numbers from previous commit. Removed unused code from PokeButton as well as cardmanager

removed sxrSettings.Instance.RecordThisFrame() from if statement in gazehandler this should fix issue #36. Refactored Driver and subsequently Slot + Parlay handlers for better encapsulation.

Effort Task Overhaul + Fixes

Fixed and issue with the left controller causing crazy issues. added effort task handler script to manage all effort task related stuff.  added in tutorial for effort task #47. removed countdowntimer since it's now in efforttaskhandler script.

Refactor initialization with coroutine for context switch

Moved DetectMovement, EffortTaskHandler, and EndProgram scripts (and their meta files) into the Scripts directory for better organization. Adjusted scene object positions and gambling type defaults in V2.unity.

Refactor + bug fix

Refactored the logic for effort task to be less redundant. Also added a new function that turns off all environments (function is used for effort task as well as end program). Patched a bug that when the effort task was activated a ball would auto spawn in the bucket scoring a point when it shouldn't have. Lastly I converted the buckets to use the soundmanager and added a loss sound for when a person throws a mismatched ball in basket.

author: tterpi
message:
Major refactor.

Control point class introduced that holds parameters and tangent calculation logic. Spline class now uses list of control points.
Currently only the complete spline can be calculated. Logic for manipulating and adding single control points without recalculating the entire spline is todo.
files_changed: InterpolatedLine.cs; KochanekBartelsControlPoint.cs; KochanekBartelsControlPoint.cs.meta; KochanekBartelsInterpolation.cs; KochanekBartelsSpline.cs; KochanekBartelsSpline.cs.meta; manifest.json; EditorSettings.asset; ProjectVersion.txt

author: tterpi
message:
Refactoring line extrusion.

New LineExtruder class was created that is used in ExtrusionTest. The
new class now holds all meshing code.

author: tterpi
message:
Changed the interpolation to remove duplicate points.

The duplicate points were causing issues with the mesh generation. The
problem now is that the last control point of the spline is not being
reached. The line ends one interpolation step before the last
control point.

author: tterpi
message:
Last segment of spline now reaches last control point.

Calculation of the last segment was changed to reach the position of the
last control point. Before it would end one interpolated point before because
the first point of the next segment would be at the position and the
last segment was not treated differently.
Also refactored the method getControlPointsForSegment.

Removed MeshFilterReference from SplineMesh script.

author: tterpi
message:
SplineMesh can now be instantiated with a ITubeMesh object.

Refactored SplineMesh to no longer hold copies of the mesh cross
section. Only TubeMeshes hold this data now. Added a CrossSection class
containing vertices, normals and scale of a cross section. ITubeMesh now
requieres methods for getting and setting cross sections and TubeMesh
and ParallelTransportTubeMesh implement this. LineSketchObject still
uses the default contructor of SplineMesh which uses TubeMesh.

author: Inkaros
message:
Unified the configuration files used by sl-experiment and this library

-- Refactored the library to parse the configuration files produced by sl-shared-assets 6.1.0+. These configuration files now stores the necessary information to create the corresponding VR environments.
-- Modified the source code to use the latest Unity 6.3 API to avoid various deprecation warnings.
-- Added dependency on YamlDotNet (and the corresponding DLL) to work with YAML files.
-- Modified the task creation script to assign the stimulus collision boundary visibility on a per-trial-type basis, parsing the trial assignment from the configuration file
-- Updated the project to work with Unity 6.3 LTS.
-- Replaced the input API with the modern API used by Unity (once again, to suppress a deprecation warning).
-- Removed all old task configurations, as they are now defined via th esl-shared-assets

author: AnimaRain
message:
Fix pattern parsing not extracting patterns correctly

If an invalid spawnable type was present in the XML file, then
the type would remain set to the type of the previous round,
continuing normally with the rest of the settings originally meant
for the invalid type. Now if an invalid type is detected, an
exception is thrown.

Also, if a spawnable type instead of containig multiple "<pattern>"
nodes it appears multiple times in the XML file, for every time the
type appears in the file another dimension is added to the "groupsByType"
collection; all patterns of the same type should be grouped in the
same dimension of the collection. To fix this, the "groupsByType"
collection was changed from a stack to a dictionary, so if a type
is repeated later we can append the collection by using
"groupsByType[type]".

Finally, the multiplier set using the "repeat" attribute in the XML
file was being set but never actually used.

Signed-off-by: AnimaRain <ioannis_spyr@yahoo.gr>

changed:
- Redesigned adding of new action

      default value (e.g. when action needs pose and there is

      followed by the action parameters menu, so the parameters
      could be altered instantly

author: magley
message:
feat: Move pause screen to separate camera

In order to use the world-space UI, the pause screenshot must be in camera space. This can be a problem if the scene clips through the image. The best solution, therefore, is to render the pause screen using its own camera which we assume will never clash with the game world.

author: magley
message:
fix: Fix dangling event subscriptions

This issue only manifests when you move between scenes (or destroy entities). The entity is destroyed, but the event subscription stays, so the whole thing is stuck in a purgatory and causes errors.

Maybe this is why I should've used UnityEvents...

author: AKissMail
message:
Refactor AiServices methods and improve code readability

The 'AiServices' methods were updated: 'Listen', 'Think', 'Speak' and 'GetOptions' were renamed to 'ConvertSpeechToTextAsync', 'SendMessageToLlm', 'ConvertTextToSpeechAsync', and 'GetAvailableModels' respectively, for better clarity. Adjustments were also made to the implementation details, such as reducing duplicated checks, removing unnecessary comments and unused imports, enhancing the header setting in the 'ConvertTextToSpeechAsync' method, and adjusting the data form used when making the 'UnityWebRequest'.

author: AKissMail
message:
The AIManager and AI services have been refactored with a focus on how the Endpoint object  will be deserialized. A class that olds the Token and an AI Model has been added. The AI model will be held in a List for each endpoint and can be reached over a get method.

Old configuration files have been removed, and an error log has been added if the Authentication fails.

Open to discuss:
public async Task<List<OptionsResponse>> GetModelsAsync()
 is, from my point of view, obsolete and can be removed.
